EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprove.label: Extensions, Discoveries, Additions and Improved Recovery, Less Related Costs
ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprove.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of extensions, discoveries and improved recovery of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Cash Inflows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Income Tax Expense
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for income tax, based on the future income less future expense derived from production and sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Net Cash Flows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount, after future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Ten Percent Annual Discount for Estimated Timing of Cash Flows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of discount on future accumulated cash inflow, after deducting future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, from sale of proved oil and gas reserves, using a discount rate of ten percent a year.

IncreaseDecreaseInFutureIncomeTaxExpense.label: Changes in Future Income Tax Expense Estimates on Future Cash Flows Related to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
IncreaseDecreaseInFutureIncomeTaxExpense.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in the estimated future income tax on future pretax net cash flows related to the entity's proved oil and gas reserves.

NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.label: Net Increase (Decrease) in Sales and Transfer Prices and Production Costs
NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in sales and transfer prices and in production (lifting) costs related to future production.

OilAndGasDeliveryCommitmentsAndContracts.label: Oil and Gas, Delivery Commitment, Supply Dedicated or Contracted
OilAndGasDeliveryCommitmentsAndContracts.description: Number of oil and gas supplies dedicated or contracted that can be used to fulfill existing contract or agreement.

RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.label: Revisions of Previous Quantity Estimates
RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of revisions of estimated quantity of oil and gas in proved reserves.

SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.label: Sales and Transfers of Oil and Gas Produced, Net of Production Costs
SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.description: Amount of (increase) decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales and transfers of oil and gas produced.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Other
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of changes from other sources.

AccountsPayableCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Current
AccountsPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccountsPayableOtherCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Other, Current
AccountsPayableOtherCurrent.description: Amount of obligations incurred classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AccretionExpense.label: Accretion Expense
AccretionExpense.description: Amount recognized for the passage of time, typically for liabilities, that have been discounted to their net present values. Excludes accretion associated with asset retirement obligations.

AccretionOfDiscount.label: Accretion of Discount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
AccretionOfDiscount.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of passage of time.

AccruedBonusesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Accrued Bonuses
AccruedBonusesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for incentive compensation awarded to employees and directors or earned by them based on the terms of one or more relevant arrangements.

AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent.label: Accrued Income Taxes, Current
AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all currently due domestic and foreign income tax obligations.

AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

AdjustmentsToReconcileNetIncomeLossToCas.label: Adjustments to Reconcile Net Income (Loss) to Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
AdjustmentsToReconcileNetIncomeLossToCas.description: The sum of adjustments which are added to or deducted from net income or loss, including the portion attributable to noncontrolling interest, to reflect cash provided by or used in operating activities, in accordance with the indirect cash flow method.

AssetRetirementObligation.label: Asset Retirement Obligation
AssetRetirementObligation.description: The carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Accretion Expense
AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.description: Amount of accretion expense recognized during the period that is associated with an asset retirement obligation. Accretion expense measures and incorporates changes due to the passage of time into the carrying amount of the liability.

AssetRetirementObligationCurrent.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Current
AssetRetirementObligationCurrent.description: Current portion of the carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

AssetRetirementObligationLegallyRestrict.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Legally Restricted Assets, Fair Value
AssetRetirementObligationLegallyRestrict.description: Carrying amount of an asset that is legally restricted for purposes of settling an asset retirement obligation.

AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesIncu.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Incurred
AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesIncu.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations incurred during the period.

AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSett.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Settled
AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSett.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled, or otherwise disposed of, during the period. This may include asset retirement obligations transferred to third parties associated with the sale of a long-lived asset.

AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstim.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Revision of Estimate
AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstim.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset retirement obligation from changes in the amount or timing of the estimated cash flows associated with the settlement of the obligation.

AssetRetirementObligationsNoncurrent.label: Asset Retirement Obligations, Noncurrent
AssetRetirementObligationsNoncurrent.description: Noncurrent portion of the carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsCurrent.label: Assets, Current
AssetsCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsNoncurrent.label: Assets, Noncurrent
AssetsNoncurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold or consumed after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AssetsNoncurrentOtherThanNoncurrentInves.label: Assets, Noncurrent, Other than Noncurrent Investments and Property, Plant and Equipment
AssetsNoncurrentOtherThanNoncurrentInves.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets, excluding property, plant, and equipment and other property and investments, that are expected to be realized in cash, sold or consumed after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Alternate captions include Total Deferred Charges and Other Assets.

BuildingsAndImprovementsGross.label: Buildings and Improvements, Gross
BuildingsAndImprovementsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of building structures held for productive use including addition, improvement, or renovation to the structure, including, but not limited to, interior masonry, interior flooring, electrical, and plumbing.

CapitalizedCostsAccumulatedDepreciationD.label: Capitalized Costs, Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion, Amortization and Valuation Allowance Relating to Oil and Gas Producing Activities
CapitalizedCostsAccumulatedDepreciationD.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization and valuation allowance relating to oil and gas producing activities.

CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.label: Capitalized Costs, Oil and Gas Producing Activities, Gross
CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.description: The sum of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities before accounting for accumulated depreciation.

CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.label: Capitalized Costs, Oil and Gas Producing Activities, Net
CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivi.description: Net amount of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities.

CapitalizedCostsProvedProperties.label: Capitalized Costs, Proved Properties
CapitalizedCostsProvedProperties.description: Capitalized costs of proved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions; wells and related equipment; support equipment and facilities; and uncompleted wells and equipment and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.

CapitalizedCostsSupportEquipmentAndFacil.label: Capitalized Costs, Support Equipment and Facilities
CapitalizedCostsSupportEquipmentAndFacil.description: Capitalized costs incurred for support equipment and facilities used in oil and gas producing activities (such as seismic equipment, drilling equipment, construction and grading equipment, vehicles, repair shops, warehouses, supply points, camps, and division, district, or field offices).

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Noncurrent
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold.label: Cost of Goods and Services Sold
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold.description: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

CostOfGoodsSoldDepreciationDepletionAndA.label: Cost of Goods Sold, Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
CostOfGoodsSoldDepreciationDepletionAndA.description: Aggregate depreciation, depletion and amortization expense in the current period for the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets directly related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

CostOfGoodsSoldOilAndGas.label: Cost of Goods Sold, Oil and Gas (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
CostOfGoodsSoldOilAndGas.description: Total costs related to oil and gas produced and sold during the reporting period.

CostOfServicesOilAndGas.label: Cost of Services, Oil and Gas (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
CostOfServicesOilAndGas.description: Costs of generating revenue from oil and gas-related services including well services (such as drilling, rigs and analytic evaluations), transportation, and other supporting contractor services, during the reporting period.

CostsAndExpenses.label: Costs and Expenses
CostsAndExpenses.description: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPrope.label: Costs Incurred, Acquisition of Oil and Gas Properties
CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPrope.description: Cost incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in acquisition of oil and gas properties.

CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPrope.label: Costs Incurred, Acquisition of Oil and Gas Properties with Proved Reserves
CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPrope.description: Costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, associated with the acquisition of oil and gas properties that have proved reserves.

CostsIncurredDevelopmentCosts.label: Costs Incurred, Development Costs
CostsIncurredDevelopmentCosts.description: Development costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in oil and gas activities.

CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

CustomerAdvancesNoncurrent.label: Customer Advances, Noncurrent
CustomerAdvancesNoncurrent.description: The noncurrent portion of prepayments received from customers for goods or services to be provided in the future.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredRevenue.label: Deferred Revenue
DeferredRevenue.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DeferredRevenueAdditions.label: Deferred Revenue, Additions
DeferredRevenueAdditions.description: Amount of deferred revenue recognized for transactions arising during the current reporting period. Deferred revenue is a liability as of the balance sheet date related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized. Generally, an Entity records deferred revenue when it receives consideration from a customer before achieving certain criteria that must be met for revenue to be recognized in conformity with GAAP.

DeferredRevenueRevenueRecognized.label: Deferred Revenue, Revenue Recognized (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
DeferredRevenueRevenueRecognized.description: Amount of previously reported deferred or unearned revenue that was recognized as revenue during the period. Deferred revenue is a liability related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized. Generally, an entity records deferred revenue when it receives consideration from a customer before achieving certain criteria that must be met for revenue to be recognized in conformity with GAAP.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net, Current
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, netted by jurisdiction and classified as current.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedBenefitObli.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Benefit Obligation
DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedBenefitObli.description: Amount of actuarial present value of benefits attributed to employee service rendered, excluding assumptions about future compensation level.

DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAsse.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Increase (Decrease) for Actual Return (Loss)
DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAsse.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from actual return (loss) determined by change in fair value of plan assets adjusted for contributions, benefit payments, and other expenses.

DefinedBenefitPlanActuarialGainLoss.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Actuarial Gain (Loss)
DefinedBenefitPlanActuarialGainLoss.description: Amount of gain (loss) from change in actuarial assumptions which (increases) decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Assumptions include, but are not limited to, interest, mortality, employee turnover, salary, and temporary deviation from substantive plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalcula.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Benefit Obligation, Discount Rate
DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalcula.description: Weighted average rate for present value of future retirement benefits cash flows, used to determine benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalcula.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Expected Long-term Rate of Return on Plan Assets
DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalcula.description: Weighted average rate of return on plan assets, reflecting average rate of earnings expected on existing plan assets and expected contributions, used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligation.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation
DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligation.description: Amount of actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitsPaid.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefits Paid (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitsPaid.description: The amount of payments made for which participants are entitled under a pension plan, including pension benefits, death benefits, and benefits due on termination of employment. Also includes payments made under a postretirement benefit plan, including prescription drug benefits, health care benefits, life insurance benefits, and legal, educational and advisory services. This item represents a periodic decrease to the plan obligations and a decrease to plan assets.

DefinedBenefitPlanContributionsByEmploye.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Contributions by Employer
DefinedBenefitPlanContributionsByEmploye.description: Amount of contribution received by defined benefit plan from employer which increases plan assets.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, after Year Five for Next Five Years
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in five fiscal years after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedReturnOnPlanAs.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Return (Loss) on Plan Assets
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedReturnOnPlanAs.description: Amount of expected return (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit, calculated based on expected long-term rate of return and market-related value of plan assets of defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Amount
DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.description: Amount of asset segregated and restricted to provide benefit under defined benefit plan. Asset includes, but is not limited to, stock, bond, other investment, earning from investment, and contribution by employer and employee.

DefinedBenefitPlanFundedStatusOfPlan.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Funded (Unfunded) Status of Plan
DefinedBenefitPlanFundedStatusOfPlan.description: Amount of funded (unfunded) status of defined benefit plan, measured as difference between fair value of plan assets and benefit obligation. Includes, but is not limited to, overfunded (underfunded) status.

DefinedBenefitPlanInterestCost.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Interest Cost
DefinedBenefitPlanInterestCost.description: Amount of cost recognized for passage of time related to defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCost.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit)
DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCost.description: Amount of net periodic benefit cost (credit) for defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossD.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit), Gain (Loss) Due to Settlement
DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossD.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit from irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk related to obligation and assets used to effect settlement.

DefinedBenefitPlanServiceCost.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Service Cost
DefinedBenefitPlanServiceCost.description: Amount of cost for actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanSettlementsBenefitObli.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, (Increase) Decrease for Settlement
DefinedBenefitPlanSettlementsBenefitObli.description: Amount of (increase) decrease to benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk for obligation and assets used to effect settlement. Includes, but is not limited to, lump-sum cash payment to participant in exchange for right to receive specified benefits, purchase of nonparticipating annuity contract and change from remeasurement.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerDiscretio.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Discretionary Contribution Amount
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerDiscretio.description: Amount of discretionary contributions made by an employer to a defined contribution plan.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, 10 Percent Annual Discount for Estimated Timing of Cash Flows (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.description: This is the amount that is derived from using a discount rate of ten percent a year to reflect the timing of the future net cash flows relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Future Cash Inflows (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.description: Amount of estimated future cash inflows from sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Future Income Tax Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.description: The estimated future income tax expenses that will be incurred based on the future income less future expenses derived from production and sale of proved oil and gas reserves in this geographic region.

DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Future Income Tax Expense (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.description: Amount of estimated future income tax expense to be incurred based on the future income less future expense derived from production and sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Future Net Cash Flows (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.description: Amount of estimated net future cash inflows, after subtracting future development and production costs and future income tax expenses, from sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Standardized Measure (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToPr.description: This amount is the future net cash flows less the computed discount.

DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerDistribu.label: Distribution Made to Limited Partner, Distributions Paid, Per Unit
DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerDistribu.description: Per unit of ownership amount of cash distributions paid to unit-holder of a limited partnership (LP).

DueFromEmployeesCurrent.label: Due from Employees, Current
DueFromEmployeesCurrent.description: Amounts due from an Entity employee, not to include stockholders or officers, which are usually due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

DueFromEmployeesNoncurrent.label: Due from Employees, Noncurrent
DueFromEmployeesNoncurrent.description: Amounts due from an Entity employee, not to include stockholders or officers, which are usually due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

DueFromJointVenturesCurrent.label: Due from Joint Ventures, Current
DueFromJointVenturesCurrent.description: Amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

DueFromRelatedParties.label: Due from Related Parties
DueFromRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from related parties including affiliates, employees, joint ventures, officers and stockholders, immediate families thereof, and pension funds.

DueToAffiliateCurrent.label: Due to Affiliate, Current
DueToAffiliateCurrent.description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend deduction, deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy deduction, and other deductions.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Depletion, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to depletion.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationOthe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationOthe.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxE.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Exempt Income, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxE.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Employee-related Liabilities, Current
EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EntityWideRevenueMajorCustomerPercentage.label: Entity-Wide Revenue, Major Customer, Percentage (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
EntityWideRevenueMajorCustomerPercentage.description: Percentage of revenue generated from a single external customer that accounts for 10 percent or more of an entity's revenues.

ExplorationAndProductionCosts.label: Exploration and Production Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ExplorationAndProductionCosts.description: Cost incurred related to the upstream oil and gas activities, such as the exploration, development, and production of crude petroleum and natural gas.

ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprove.label: Extensions, Discoveries, Additions and Improved Recovery, Less Related Costs
ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprove.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of extensions, discoveries and improved recovery of proved oil and gas reserves.

FairValueInputsDiscountRate.label: Fair Value Inputs, Discount Rate (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FairValueInputsDiscountRate.description: Interest rate used to find the present value of an amount to be paid or received in the future as an input to measure fair value. For example, but not limited to, weighted average cost of capital (WACC), cost of capital, cost of equity and cost of debt.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Cash Inflows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Income Tax Expense
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for income tax, based on the future income less future expense derived from production and sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Net Cash Flows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount, after future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Ten Percent Annual Discount for Estimated Timing of Cash Flows
FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAnd.description: Amount of discount on future accumulated cash inflow, after deducting future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, from sale of proved oil and gas reserves, using a discount rate of ten percent a year.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Other Assets
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

GasAndOilAreaUndevelopedNet.label: Gas and Oil Area, Undeveloped, Net
GasAndOilAreaUndevelopedNet.description: Fractional interest owned based on working interests or other economic arrangements of lease area on which wells have not been drilled or completed to a point that would permit the production of commercial quantities of oil and gas regardless of whether or not such area contains proved reserves.

GasImbalancePayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Gas Balancing Payable
GasImbalancePayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to an underproduced working interest owner when an overproduced working interest owner has sold gas in excess of the party's ownership percentage.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

ImpairmentOfOilAndGasProperties.label: Impairment of Oil and Gas Properties
ImpairmentOfOilAndGasProperties.description: The expense recorded to reduce the value of oil and gas assets consisting of proved properties and unproved properties as the estimate of future successful production from these properties is reduced.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductions.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductions.description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend deduction, deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy deduction, and other deductions.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Depletion, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible depletion.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxExemptIncome.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Exempt Income, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxExemptIncome.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

IncreaseDecreaseInCustomerAdvances.label: Increase (Decrease) in Customer Advances
IncreaseDecreaseInCustomerAdvances.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of prepayments by customers for goods or services to be provided at a later date.

IncreaseDecreaseInEstimatedFutureDevelop.label: Changes in Estimated Future Development Costs
IncreaseDecreaseInEstimatedFutureDevelop.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in estimated future development costs.

IncreaseDecreaseInFutureIncomeTaxExpense.label: Changes in Future Income Tax Expense Estimates on Future Cash Flows Related to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
IncreaseDecreaseInFutureIncomeTaxExpense.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in the estimated future income tax on future pretax net cash flows related to the entity's proved oil and gas reserves.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Current Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

InterestIncomeDomesticDeposits.label: Interest Income, Domestic Deposits
InterestIncomeDomesticDeposits.description: Interest earned on deposits in United States money market accounts and other United States interest earning accounts.

InterestIncomeOther.label: Interest Income, Other
InterestIncomeOther.description: Amount of interest income earned from interest bearing assets classified as other.

InvestmentIncomeDividend.label: Investment Income, Dividend
InvestmentIncomeDividend.description: Amount of dividend income on nonoperating securities.

InvestmentIncomeInterestAndDividend.label: Investment Income, Interest and Dividend
InvestmentIncomeInterestAndDividend.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income and dividend income on nonoperating securities.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesCurrent.label: Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsAuthor.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Authorized
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsAuthor.description: The number of limited partner units authorized to be issued.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Issued
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.description: The number of limited partner units issued.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of limited partner units outstanding.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to General Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to Limited Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Net income (loss) allocated to each outstanding limited partnership unit.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.label: Net Increase (Decrease) in Sales and Transfer Prices and Production Costs
NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in sales and transfer prices and in production (lifting) costs related to future production.

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

OilAndGasDeliveryCommitmentsAndContracts.label: Oil and Gas Delivery Commitments and Contracts, Fixed Price
OilAndGasDeliveryCommitmentsAndContracts.description: The delivery price committed to in the contract.

OilAndGasDeliveryCommitmentsAndContracts.label: Oil and Gas Delivery Commitments and Contracts, Significant Supplies Dedicated or Contracted to Entity
OilAndGasDeliveryCommitmentsAndContracts.description: Significant oil and gas supplies dedicated or contracted to the enterprise that can be used to fulfill existing contracts or agreements.

OilAndGasSalesRevenue.label: Oil and Gas Sales Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OilAndGasSalesRevenue.description: Revenue from the sale of oil and gas during the period.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsCurrent.label: Other Assets, Current
OtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherSalesRevenueNet.label: Other Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherSalesRevenueNet.description: Amount, after sales adjustments, returns, allowances, and discounts, of revenue classified as other.

OtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Other Short-term Borrowings
OtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Amount of borrowings classified as other, maturing within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributionPerUni.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distribution Per Unit of Limited Partner Interest
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributionPerUni.description: The amount of the distribution per unit of limited partner interest.

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountOptionExercise.label: Partners' Capital Account, Option Exercise
PartnersCapitalAccountOptionExercise.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to option exercise. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsPurch.label: Partners' Capital Account, Treasury Units, Purchased
PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsPurch.description: Value of units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Treasury Units Purchased
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury.description: Units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

PaymentsForProceedsFromAvailableforsaleS.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Available-for-sale Securities, Short-term
PaymentsForProceedsFromAvailableforsaleS.description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) through acquisition (sale) of short-term available-for-sale securities.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfOtherEquity.label: Payments for Repurchase of Other Equity
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfOtherEquity.description: Amount of cash outflow to reacquire equity classified as other.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasPropertyAndEqu.label: Payments to Acquire Oil and Gas Property and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasPropertyAndEqu.description: The cash outflow to purchase long lived physical asset for use in the normal oil and gas operations and to purchase mineral interests in oil and gas properties not intended for resale.

PaymentsToAcquireShortTermInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Short-term Investments
PaymentsToAcquireShortTermInvestments.description: The cash outflow for securities or other assets acquired, which qualify for treatment as an investing activity and are to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Collection of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfOtherReceivables.label: Proceeds from Collection of Other Receivables
ProceedsFromCollectionOfOtherReceivables.description: Amount of cash inflow from the collection of receivables classified as other.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.label: Proceeds, Issuance of Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Including Option Exercised
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, option exercised.

ProceedsFromOtherEquity.label: Proceeds from Other Equity
ProceedsFromOtherEquity.description: Amount of cash inflow from the issuance of equity classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOilAndGasPropertyAndEq.label: Proceeds from Sale of Oil and Gas Property and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfOilAndGasPropertyAndEq.description: The cash inflow to dispose of long-lived, physical assets and mineral interests in oil and gas properties used for normal oil and gas operations.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingAc.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Assets, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingAc.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets recognized in investing activities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherInvestments.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.label: Proceeds from Stock Options Exercised
ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.description: Amount of cash inflow from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProvedOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortM.label: Proved Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method
ProvedOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortM.description: Oil and Gas properties with proved reserves under the successful effort method.

ReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Receivables, Net, Current
ReceivablesNetCurrent.description: The total amount due to the entity within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

ReceivableWithImputedInterestEffectiveYi.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Effective Yield (Interest Rate)
ReceivableWithImputedInterestEffectiveYi.description: Yield on the receivable, on which interest has been imputed, as calculated from its issuance value or purchase price. The calculated effective interest rate considers factors such as the issued face value or price paid for the receivable, the time period between payments, and the time until maturity [full receipt] of the receivable.

RelatedPartyDepositLiabilities.label: Related Party Deposit Liabilities
RelatedPartyDepositLiabilities.description: Amount of deposits held by the entity for a related party (entity, shareholder, employee).

ResultsOfOperationsAccretionOfAssetRetir.label: Results of Operations, Accretion of Asset Retirement Obligations
ResultsOfOperationsAccretionOfAssetRetir.description: Accretion expense of asset retirement obligations related to oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletion.label: Results of Operations, Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, and Valuation Provisions
ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletion.description: Depreciation, depletion and amortization, and valuation provisions (impairments) related to oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsExpenseFromOilAndGasP.label: Results of Operations, Expense from Oil and Gas Producing Activities
ResultsOfOperationsExpenseFromOilAndGasP.description: The amount of expenses related to oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGas.label: Results of Operations, Impairment of Oil and Gas Properties
ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGas.description: Costs related to the impairment of oil and gas properties

ResultsOfOperationsIncomeBeforeIncomeTax.label: Results of Operations, Income before Income Taxes
ResultsOfOperationsIncomeBeforeIncomeTax.description: Income before income taxes for oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense.label: Results of Operations, Income Tax Expense
ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense.description: Income tax expense for oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingAct.label: Results of Operations, Oil and Gas Producing Activities Net Income (Excluding Corporate Overhead and Interest Costs)
ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingAct.description: The results of operations for oil and gas producing activities, excluding corporate overhead and interest costs.

ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCo.label: Results of Operations, Production or Lifting Costs
ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCo.description: Production (lifting) costs from oil and gas producing activities, including but not limited to lease operating expense, production and ad valorem taxes, and transportation expense.

ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasP.label: Results of Operations, Revenue from Oil and Gas Producing Activities
ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasP.description: Total revenues from oil and gas producing activities.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

RevenueOilAndGasServices.label: Revenue, Oil and Gas Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RevenueOilAndGasServices.description: Revenue from oil and gas-related services including well services (such as drilling, rigs and analytic evaluations), transportation, and other supporting contractor services, during the reporting period.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.label: Revisions of Previous Quantity Estimates
RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of revisions of estimated quantity of oil and gas in proved reserves.

SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.label: Sales and Transfers of Oil and Gas Produced, Net of Production Costs
SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.description: Amount of (increase) decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales and transfers of oil and gas produced.

SalesRevenueGoodsNetPercentage.label: Sales Revenue, Goods, Net, Percentage (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
SalesRevenueGoodsNetPercentage.description: The percentage of net product revenue to total net revenue from the sale of goods as of year end.

SettlementOfAssetRetirementObligationsTh.label: Settlement of Asset Retirement Obligations Through Noncash Payments, Amount
SettlementOfAssetRetirementObligationsTh.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled through noncash transactions. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement from service of a tangible long-lived asset.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Net of Forfeitures
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Net number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Other
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of changes from other sources.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of discounted future accumulated cash inflow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WellServiceExpense.label: Well Service Expense (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
WellServiceExpense.description: Cost incurred related to well drilled or completed for the purpose of supporting production.

CommitmentsAndContingencies.label: Commitments and Contingencies
CommitmentsAndContingencies.description: Represents the caption on the face of the balance sheet to indicate that the entity has entered into (1) purchase or supply arrangements that will require expending a portion of its resources to meet the terms thereof, and (2) is exposed to potential losses or, less frequently, gains, arising from (a) possible claims against a company's resources due to future performance under contract terms, and (b) possible losses or likely gains from uncertainties that will ultimately be resolved when one or more future events that are deemed likely to occur do occur or fail to occur.
